<description type="note">Title: The trial of Christ and the thieves before Pilate.
Genre: English mystery and miracle plays.
<description type="note">Square brackets represent sections of text unclear in the original and supplied by the current editor.</description>
[The Trial of Christ and the Thieves before Pilate]

here Ã¾e jewys bryng jhesus A?en to pylat. ius doctor Sere pylat gode tydandys Ã¾ou here of me Of herowd Ã¾e kyng Ã¾ou hast good wyl And jhesus he sendyth A?en to the And byddyth Ã¾e chese hym to save or spylle. ijus doctor ?a ser all Ã¾e poer lyth now in Ã¾e and Ã¾ou knowyst oure feyth he hath ner schent Ã¾ou knowyst what myschef Ã¾er of may be we charge Ã¾e to gyf hym jwgement. Pylat Serys trewly ?e be to blame Jhesus Ã¾us to bete dyspoyle or bynde or put hym to so gret schame ffor no defawth in hym I fynde. Ne herowdys nother to whom I sent ?ow defawte in hym cowde fynde ryth non but sent hym A?en to me be ?ow As ?e knowe wel everychon. Ther fore vndyrstande what I xal say ?e knowe Ã¾e custom is in Ã¾is londe of ?our pasche day Ã¾at is ner honde what Ã¾eff or tretore be in bonde with-out Any price for worchep of Ã¾at xal go fre Away Now Ã¾an me thynkyth it were ryth to lete jhesus now go qwyte And do to hym no mo dyspyte serys Ã¾is is myn A-vyse I wolde wete what ?e say. here Alle Ã¾ei xul cryen Nay nay nay. ius doctor delyvere us Ã¾e Ã¾eff barabas Ã¾at for mansclawth presonde was. Pylat What xal I Ã¾an with jhesu do Whethyr xal he A-byde or go. ijus doctor Jhesus xal on Ã¾e cros be don Crucifigatur we crye echon. pylat Serys what hath jhesus don A-mys Crucifigatur we sey At onys. populus clamabit. Pylat Serys syn Al gatys ?e wolyn so puttyn jhesu to wo and peyn jhesus A wyle with me xal go I wole hym examyne betwyx us tweyn. here pylat takyth jhesu and ledyth hym in to Ã¾e cowncel hous and seyth Jhesus what seys now lete se This matere now Ã¾ou vndyrstonde In pes Ã¾ou myth be for me but for Ã¾i pepyl of Ã¾i londe. Busshoppys and prestys of Ã¾e lawe Ã¾ei love Ã¾e not as Ã¾ou mayst se and Ã¾e comon pepyl A-?ens Ã¾e drawe In pes Ã¾ou myth A be for me Ã¾is I telle Ã¾e pleyn. What seyst jhesus whi spekyst not me to knowyst not I haue power on Ã¾e cros Ã¾e to do And also I haue power to lete Ã¾e forth go what kanst Ã¾ou here to seyn. Jhesus On me poer Ã¾ou hast ryth non but Ã¾at my fadyr hath grawntyd be-forn I cam my faderys wyl to full-fylle Ã¾at mankynd xuld not spylle he Ã¾at hath betrayd me to Ã¾e at Ã¾is tyme his trespas is more Ã¾an is Ã¾ine. ius doctor ?e pryncys and maysterys takyth hed and se how pylat in Ã¾is matere is favorabyl and Ã¾us oure lawys dystroyd myth be And to vs Alle vn-recurabyl. here pylat letyth jhesus A-lone and goth in to Ã¾e jewys and seyth Pylat Serys what wole ?e now with jhesu do I can fynde in hym but good it is my cownce ?e lete hym go it is rewthe spylle his blood. Cayphas Pylat me thynkyth Ã¾ou dost gret wrong A?ens oure lawe Ã¾us to fortefye and Ã¾e pepyl here is so strong bryngyng Ã¾e lawful testymonye. Annas ?a and Ã¾ou lete jhesu fro us pace Ã¾is we welyn up-holdyn Alle Ã¾ou xalt Answere for his trespas and tretour to Ã¾e emperour we xal Ã¾e kalle. Pylat Now Ã¾an syn ?e wolne non other weye but in Alwyse Ã¾at jhesus must deye Artyse bryng me watyr I pray Ã¾e and what I wole do ?e xal se hic vnus afferet aquam. As I wasche with watyr my handys clene so gyltles of hese deth I mut ben. ius doctor Ã¾e blod of hym mut ben on vs et clamabunt ?a ?a ?a and on oure chyldyr Aftyr vs Ã¾an pylat goth A-?en to jhesu and bryngith hym Ã¾us seyng Pylat lo serys I bryng hym here to ?our presens Ã¾at ?e may knowe I fynde in hym non offens. ijus doctor dylyuere hym delyuere hym and lete us go on Ã¾e crosse Ã¾at he were do. pilat Serys wolde ?e ?our kyng I xulde on Ã¾e cros don. iijus doctor Sere we seyn Ã¾at we haue no kyng but Ã¾e emperour a-lon pilat Serys syn Al-gatys it must be so We must syt and our offyce do brynge forth to Ã¾e barre Ã¾at Arn to be dempt and Ã¾ei xal haue here jugement. here Ã¾ei brynge barabas to Ã¾e barre and jhesu and ij Ã¾ewys in here shertys bare leggyd and jhesus standyng at Ã¾e barre be-twyx them and annas and cayphas xal gon in to Ã¾e cowncelle hous qwan pylat sytty[th.] Pylat Barabas hold up Ã¾i hond for here at Ã¾i delyvere dost Ã¾ou stond and he halt up his honde Serys qwhat sey ?e of barabas thef and tretour bold xal he go fre or he xal be kept in holde. ius doctor Sere for Ã¾e solennyte of oure pasche day be oure lawe he xal go fre A-way. Pylat Barabas Ã¾an I dymysse Ã¾e and ?eve Ã¾e lycens to go fre et curret. dysmas and jesmas ther as ?e stondys Ã¾e lawe comawndyth ?ou to hald up ?our hondys Sere what sey ?e of Ã¾ese theyvs tweyn. ijus doctor Sere Ã¾ei ben both gylty we seyn. Pylat And what sey ?e of jhesu of nazareth. ius doctor Sere we sey he xal be put to deth. Pylat And kone ?e put A-?ens hym no trespas. ijus doctor Sere we wyl All Ã¾at he xal be put upon Ã¾e crosse. et clamabunt omnes voce magna dicentes ?a ?a ?a Pylat jhesu Ã¾in owyn pepyl han dysprevyd Al Ã¾at I haue for Ã¾e seyd or mevyd. I charge ?ou All at Ã¾e be-gynnyng As ?e wole Answere me be-forn Ã¾at Ã¾er be no man xal towch ?our kyng but yf he be knyght or jentylman born.
